Articles.Content:
Hey guys, i'm new on the forum but not on this wonderful game, i wanted to ask something: I have alot of mod's parts, so much that even if i have 400h of game time they are slowing my design and construction phase. Is there a solution to put every part from a specific mod inside a "tab" to show up when i want? Like: "oh now i need some interplanetary travel engine, let's open the *nearfuturepropulsion* tab and let's choose an engine", instead of having 23526345234 engines all together.

Thank you <3
You need Filter Extensions. It redoes the "Manufacturers" advanced tab to sort by mod folder instead of in-game manufacturer.
Thank you alot i will try soon
